name: Absolut Repair 10-In-1 Hair Oil for Dry Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A lightweight, multi-use hair oil blended with gold quinoa and proteins that provides 10 treatment, styling, and protection benefits in one bottle..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Infused with quinoa and proteins to hydrate dry, damaged hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Gold Quinoa: A complex blend of amino acids to repair, hydrate, and protect against external aggressors..What Else You Need to Know:This multi-purpose hair oil provides 10 restorative benefits in one: hydrates, restores the hair fiber, softens, smooths, easily detangles, protects against heat and pollutants, eases blow-drying, conditions, adds shine, and leaves hair with a lightweight feel. Use to treat the hair before the cutting, as a primer before blow-drying, or as a styling agent when touching up in between styles..Fragrance Description:A sensorial fragrance blended with top notes of bergamot and mandarin, middle notes of mimosa, freesia, and peony, and base notes of white musk.
ingredients: -Gold Quinoa: A complex blend of amino acids to repair, hydrate, and protect against external aggressors. .-Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein: A vegetable protein that seals the hair cuticle to add hydration. ..Aqua / Water , Cera Alba / Beeswax , Dimethicone , Isopropyl Myristate , Phenoxyethanol , Hydroxypropyl Guar , Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil , Triethanolamine , Hydroxyethylcellulose , Caprylyl Glycol , Dimethiconol , Peg-30 Glyceryl Stearate , Hydrogenated Styrene/Butadiene Copolymer , Ethylhexylglycerin , Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer , Hexyl Cinnamal , Linalool , Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate , Citronellol , Geraniol , Benzyl Alcohol , Limonene , Hydroxycitronellal , Benzyl Salicylate , Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone , Peg-30 Dipolyhydroxystearate , Trideceth-6 , Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein , Citral , Hydrolyzed Corn Protein , Hydrolyzed Soy Protein , Tocopherol , Parfum / Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For fine to medium hair types, use one to two pumps.   .-For medium to thick hair types, use two to four pumps. .-Warm oil in your palms. .-Spread evenly in hair through lengths and ends..-Do not rinse. .-Style as usual...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove pump and dispose into its proper container..-Thoroughly rinse out any remaining product inside bottle, then dry. .-Place bottle in your recycling bin.

It smelled amazing and was shiny, bouncy, and beautiful. I realized then that the hair oil was the missing piece of the puzzle. It wasn't a matter of choosing between the metal detox shampoo and conditioner or the hair oil; it was a matter of using all three products together in a routine that set me up for success.  Now, I use the set of metal detox and the hair oil religiously, and my hair has never looked better. It's amazing how a few simple changes to my haircare routine have made such a big difference. I'm grateful to have found a routine that works for me, and I'm excited to see what other haircare secrets I'll uncover in the future.

reviews.review_text: I have been using this repair oil for about a month now and have noticed quite a difference in my wavy, thick, hard to manage hair. I make sure not to go past the half way part of my hair because if you get too close to your roots it can leave your hair looking oily or weighed down and dirty. That is the reason for my 4 star rating.  I believe the proteins are definitely helping with my fly-a-ways and making my hair look and feel so much healthier. reviews.review_text: I was skeptical when I first got this because so many hair oils are just silicone heavy and don't do anything beneficial for the hair beyond smoothing. It also contains castor oil, which has also long been used for conditioning and strengthening hair, and people say it helps with growth, too. Very effective product, certainly feels like my hair is healthier since starting to use it.
